mapper.select: SELECT ic.id, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(m.label_name) FROM maa_conf_label m WHERE m.label_code = 'IPO_SPECIAL_ARRANGE' AND m.status = '1' AND FIND_IN_SET(m.label_value,ic.special_arrange))AS specialArrange, ic.company_zh_name, ic.industry_status_overview, ic.industry_csrc AS industryCsrcCode, ic.ipo_plate plateCode, (SELECT mcl.label_name FROM maa_conf_label mcl WHERE mcl.label_code = 'IPO_PLATE' AND mcl.label_value = ic.ipo_plate) AS ipo_plate, (SELECT group_concat(mcl1.label_name) FROM maa_conf_label mcl1 WHERE mcl1.label_code = 'INDUSTRY_CSRC_2012' AND find_in_set(mcl1.label_value,TRIM(LEADING '0' FROM ic.industry_csrc))) AS industry_csrc, ic.company_name, ic.company_code, ic.issue_condition, (select GROUP_CONCAT(m.label_name) FROM maa_conf_label m where m.label_code = 'IPO_ISSUE_CONDITION' AND m.status = '1' and FIND_IN_SET(m.label_value,ic.issue_condition)) AS issueConditionName, ( SELECT REGEXP_REPLACE(p.PARAMCHNAME, "[a-z]|[A-Z]|[-]|[ ]|[.]", "") FROM cfp_pvalue p where p.NIPMID ='127000000001707338' AND p.eisdel = '0' AND p.PARAMCODE = ic.addr_country ) AS addr_country, (SELECT p.area_name FROM provinces p WHERE p.area_no = ic.addr_prov) AS addr_prov, (SELECT p.area_name FROM provinces p WHERE p.area_no = ic.addr_city) AS addr_city, (SELECT p.area_name FROM provinces p WHERE p.area_no = ic.addr_area) AS addr_area, CONVERT(ic.registered_assets,DECIMAL(18,2)) AS registered_assets, (SELECT person_name FROM ipo_person_info WHERE bid = #{id} AND person_type = '1') AS actualController, (SELECT person_name FROM ipo_person_info WHERE bid = #{id} AND person_type = '2') AS controlShareholder, (SELECT group_concat(mcl2.label_name) FROM maa_conf_label mcl2 WHERE mcl2.label_code = 'REP_COMPANY_NATURE' AND find_in_set(mcl2.label_value,ic.company_nature)) AS company_nature, ic.major_businesses, (SELECT group_concat(mcl3.label_name) FROM maa_conf_label mcl3 WHERE mcl3.label_code = 'IPO_STRUCTURE_TYPE' AND find_in_set(mcl3.label_value,ic.structure_label)) AS structure_label, ic.structure_url, (SELECT group_concat(mcl4.label_name) FROM maa_conf_label mcl4 WHERE mcl4.label_code = 'STRAGETIC_EMERGING_INDUSTRIES' AND find_in_set(mcl4.label_value,ic.stragetic_industries)) AS stragetic_industries, (SELECT group_concat(mcl5.label_name) FROM maa_conf_label mcl5 WHERE mcl5.label_code = 'IPO_PLACING_MECHANISM' AND find_in_set(mcl5.label_value,ic.placing_mechanism)) AS placing_mechanism, (SELECT group_concat(mcl6.label_name) FROM maa_conf_label mcl6 WHERE mcl6.label_code = 'INDUSTRIES_NATIONAL_2020' AND find_in_set(mcl6.label_value,ic.national_industries)) AS nationalIndustries FROM ipo_case ic WHERE ic.id = #{id} limit 1

select ic.id AS caseId, ic.title AS progressName, ic.org_code AS orgCode, (select iec_result from ipo_process w2 where ic.id = w2.bid and w2.iec_result is not null order by w2.process_time desc limit 1) AS iecResult, DATE_FORMAT(ip1.process_time,'%Y-%m-%d') AS processTime,ccsi.release_flag as releaseFlag,ic.open_flag AS openFlag from ipo_case ic left join case_common_status_info ccsi on ccsi.case_id = ic.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT t.* FROM ( SELECT bid, process_time, iec_result FROM ipo_process WHERE process_type_code = '07' or process_type_code = '35' or process_type_code = '38' ORDER BY process_time DESC LIMIT 2147483647 ) t GROUP BY t.bid) ip ON ic.id = ip.bid LEFT JOIN (SELECT t.* FROM ( SELECT bid, process_time, iec_result FROM ipo_process WHERE process_type_code = '04' or process_type_code = '31' ORDER BY process_time DESC LIMIT 2147483647 ) t GROUP BY t.bid) ip1 ON ic.id = ip1.bid where 1=1 AND ccsi.release_flag = '1' AND ic.org_code = (select org_code from ipo_case where id = #{id}) AND ic.id != #{id} ORDER BY processTime DESC
SELECT org_code AS orgCode,company_name AS companyName FROM ipo_case WHERE id = #{id} limit 1

SELECT t.id, t.bid, t.person_name AS personName, t.shareName AS shareHolderNature, CONVERT(t.share_num,DECIMAL(18,2)) AS shareNum, CONVERT(t.share_num / t.sumNum * 100, DECIMAL(18,2)) AS shareRatio FROM ( SELECT ipi.id, ipi.bid, ipi.person_name, ( SELECT mcl.label_name FROM maa_conf_label mcl WHERE mcl.label_code = 'IPO_SHAREHOLDER_NATURE' AND mcl.label_value = ipi.share_holder_nature ) AS shareName, ipi.share_num, ( SELECT registered_assets FROM ipo_case WHERE id = #{bid} ) AS sumNum FROM ipo_person_info ipi WHERE ipi.person_type = '3' AND ipi.bid = #{bid} ) t

SELECT t.company_code companyCode,t.otc_level, (select m.label_name FROM maa_conf_label m where m.label_code = 'IPO_OTC_LEVEL' AND m.status = '1' and m.label_value=t.otc_level) AS otcLevelName, t.host_broker_name hostBrokerName,DATE_FORMAT(t.publish_time,'%Y-%m-%d') otcPublishTime FROM ipo_otc_listing t WHERE t.bid = #{id}

SELECT tb.*,year(tb.date) finYear,(CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(tb.date,'%m%d') <= '0331' THEN '003' WHEN DATE_FORMAT(tb.date,'%m%d') > '0331' AND DATE_FORMAT(tb.date,'%m%d') <= '0630' THEN '002' WHEN DATE_FORMAT(tb.date,'%m%d') > '0630' AND DATE_FORMAT(tb.date,'%m%d') <= '0930' THEN '004' WHEN DATE_FORMAT(tb.date,'%m%d') > '0930' AND DATE_FORMAT(tb.date,'%m%d') <= '1231' THEN '001' ELSE '' END) finType FROM(SELECT t1.SECURITY_CD companyCode,t1.SECURITY_NM companyName, (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(m.report_period,'%Y-%m-%d') FROM ipo_main_income_info m WHERE m.bid = t.id LIMIT 1) AS date FROM ipo_case t,vc_company t1 WHERE t.id = '746524673180966565' AND t.company_name = t1.SECURITY_NM) AS tb WHERE tb.date != '' and tb.date is not null ORDER BY tb.companyCode DESC

SELECT t1.split_memo AS splitMemo,t1.id AS id, (SELECT group_concat(mcl4.label_name) FROM maa_conf_label mcl4 WHERE mcl4.label_code = 'IPO_SPLIT_MARKET' AND find_in_set(mcl4.label_value,t2.split_market)) AS splitMarket, CONCAT(t2.company_name,'(',t2.company_code,')') AS companyName, t2.company_code AS companyCode, t2.share_proportion AS shareProportion FROM ipo_split_map AS t1, ipo_split AS t2 WHERE t1.id = t2.bid AND t1.bid = #{bid}

SELECT a.valuationType, CASE a.valuationPriceUnit WHEN "人民币" THEN "元" ELSE a.valuationPriceUnit END AS valuationPriceUnit, CASE a.valuationEquityUnit WHEN "人民币" THEN "元" ELSE a.valuationEquityUnit END AS valuationEquityUnit, a.valuationDate, a.valuationPrice, a.valuationEquity, a.valuationValue, a.valuationMemo FROM ( SELECT (SELECT group_concat(mc.label_name) FROM maa_conf_label mc WHERE mc.label_code = 'valuation_type' AND find_in_set(mc.label_value,valuation_type)) AS valuationType, (SELECT group_concat(mc.label_name) FROM maa_conf_label mc WHERE mc.label_code = 'CURRENCY_CODE' AND find_in_set(mc.label_value,valuation_price_unit)) AS valuationPriceUnit, (SELECT group_concat(mc.label_name) FROM maa_conf_label mc WHERE mc.label_code = 'CURRENCY_CODE' AND find_in_set(mc.label_value,valuation_equity_unit)) AS valuationEquityUnit, DATE_FORMAT(valuation_date,'%Y-%m-%d') AS valuationDate, valuation_price AS valuationPrice, valuation_equity AS valuationEquity, valuation_value AS valuationValue, valuation_memo AS valuationMemo FROM ipo_valuation WHERE bid = #{bid}) as a
SELECT id, bid, company_code AS companyCode, company_name AS companyName, situation FROM ipo_main_competitor_info WHERE bid = #{bid}

SELECT bid, '数量' AS labelName, domestic_invention AS fm,domestic_newtype AS sy, domestic_design as wg, foreign_patent as gw, (IFNULL(domestic_invention,0)+IFNULL(domestic_newtype,0)+IFNULL(domestic_design,0)+IFNULL(foreign_patent,0)) AS hj FROM ipo_technology AS t1 WHERE bid = #{bid} UNION SELECT bid,'占比' AS labelName, IFNULL(domestic_invention,0)/t2.hj * 100 AS fm, IFNULL(domestic_newtype,0)/t2.hj * 100 AS sy, IFNULL(domestic_design,0)/t2.hj * 100 AS wg,IFNULL(foreign_patent,0)/t2.hj * 100 as gw,t2.hj/t2.hj * 100 AS hj FROM ipo_technology AS t1, (SELECT IFNULL(domestic_invention,0)+IFNULL(domestic_newtype,0)+IFNULL(domestic_design,0)+IFNULL(foreign_patent,0) AS hj FROM ipo_technology WHERE bid = #{bid}) AS t2 WHERE t1.bid = #{bid}

SELECT '研发投入' AS labelName, dev_input_fi AS firstYearValue, dev_input_se AS secondYearValue, dev_input_th AS thirdYearValue, dev_input_fo AS forthYearValue, IFNULL(dev_input_fi,0) + IFNULL(dev_input_se,0) + IFNULL(dev_input_th,0) + IFNULL(dev_input_fo,0) AS allNumValue FROM ipo_technology WHERE bid = #{bid} UNION SELECT '营业收入' AS labelName, trade_fi AS firstYearValue, trade_se AS secondYearValue, trade_th AS thirdYearValue, trade_fo AS forthYearValue, IFNULL(trade_fi,0) + IFNULL(trade_se,0) + IFNULL(trade_th,0) + IFNULL(trade_fo,0) AS allNumValue FROM ipo_technology WHERE bid = #{bid} UNION SELECT '研发投入占营业收入的比例' AS labelName, TRUNCATE(dev_input_fi/trade_fi,4)*100 AS firstYearValue, TRUNCATE(dev_input_se/trade_se,4)*100 AS secondYearValue, TRUNCATE(dev_input_th/trade_th,4)*100 AS thirdYearValue, TRUNCATE(dev_input_fo/trade_fo,4)*100 AS forthYearValue, TRUNCATE((IFNULL(dev_input_fi,0) + IFNULL(dev_input_se,0) + IFNULL(dev_input_th,0) + IFNULL(dev_input_fo,0)) /(IFNULL(trade_fi,0) + IFNULL(trade_se,0) + IFNULL(trade_th,0) + IFNULL(trade_fo,0)),4)*100 AS allNumValue FROM ipo_technology WHERE bid = #{bid}

SELECT '核心技术人员' AS labelName, core_fi AS firstYearValue, TRUNCATE(core_fi/count_fi,4)*100 AS firstYearPro, core_se AS secondYearValue, TRUNCATE(core_se/count_se,4)*100 AS secondYearPro, core_th AS thirdYearValue, TRUNCATE(core_th/count_th,4)*100 AS thirdYearPro, core_fo AS forthYearValue, TRUNCATE(core_fo/count_fo,4)*100 AS forthYearPro FROM ipo_technology WHERE bid = #{bid} UNION SELECT '研发技术人员' AS labelName, dev_fi AS firstYearValue, TRUNCATE(dev_fi/count_fi,4)*100 AS firstYearPro, dev_se AS secondYearValue, TRUNCATE(dev_se/count_se,4)*100 AS secondYearPro, dev_th AS thirdYearValue, TRUNCATE(dev_th/count_th,4)*100 AS thirdYearPro, dev_fo AS forthYearValue, TRUNCATE(dev_fo/count_fo,4)*100 AS forthYearPro FROM ipo_technology WHERE bid = #{bid} UNION SELECT '公司员工总数' AS labelName, count_fi AS firstYearValue, TRUNCATE(count_fi/count_fi,4)*100 AS firstYearPro, count_se AS secondYearValue, TRUNCATE(count_se/count_se,4)*100 AS secondYearPro, count_th AS thirdYearValue, TRUNCATE(count_th/count_th,4)*100 AS thirdYearPro, count_fo AS forthYearValue, TRUNCATE(count_fo/count_fo,4)*100 AS forthYearPro FROM ipo_technology WHERE bid = #{bid}

SELECT '项目时间' AS dateName, DATE_FORMAT(project_date_fi,'%Y-%m-%d') AS firstYearDate, DATE_FORMAT(project_date_se,'%Y-%m-%d') AS secondYearDate, DATE_FORMAT(project_date_th,'%Y-%m-%d') AS thirdYearDate, DATE_FORMAT(project_date_fo,'%Y-%m-%d') AS forthYearDate FROM ipo_technology WHERE bid=#{bid} UNION SELECT '类别时间' AS dateName, DATE_FORMAT(category_date_fi,'%Y-%m-%d') AS firstYearDate, DATE_FORMAT(category_date_se,'%Y-%m-%d') AS secondYearDate, DATE_FORMAT(category_date_th,'%Y-%m-%d') AS thirdYearDate, DATE_FORMAT(category_date_fo,'%Y-%m-%d') AS forthYearDate FROM ipo_technology WHERE bid=#{bid}

select CASE dev_remarks WHEN "" THEN NULL ELSE dev_remarks END AS devRemarks, dev_input_fi AS devInputFi, dev_input_se AS devInputSe, dev_input_th AS devInputTh, dev_input_fo AS devInputFo, trade_fi AS tradeFi, trade_se AS tradeSe, trade_th AS tradeTh, trade_fo AS tradeFo, CASE patent_remarks WHEN "" THEN NULL ELSE patent_remarks END AS patentRemarks, CASE core_remarks WHEN "" THEN NULL ELSE core_remarks END AS coreRemarks, core_fi AS coreFi, core_se AS coreSe, core_th AS coreTh, core_fo AS coreFo, dev_fi AS devFi, dev_se AS devSe, dev_th AS devTh, dev_fo AS devFo, count_fi AS countFi, count_se AS countSe, count_th AS countTh, count_fo AS countFo from ipo_technology where bid = #{bid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT t.ipo_plate AS ipoPlate,t1.domestic_invention AS domesticInvention, t1.domestic_newtype AS domesticNewtype,t1.domestic_design AS domesticDesign, t1.foreign_patent AS foreignPatent FROM ipo_case AS t, ipo_technology AS t1 WHERE 1=1 AND t.id = t1.bid AND t.ipo_plate = '069001001006' AND t.id = #{id}
SELECT dev_remarks as devRemarks,patent_remarks AS patentRemarks,core_remarks AS coreRemarks FROM ipo_technology WHERE bid=#{bid}

SELECT iscm.id,iscm.bid,iscm.report_period,iscm.main_type,iscm.title,iscm.remark,isci.id e_id,isci.bid e_bid,isci.company_code, isci.company_name, isci.first_year_content, isci.first_year_amount, isci.first_year_ratio, isci.second_year_content, isci.second_year_amount, isci.second_year_ratio, isci.third_year_content, isci.third_year_amount, isci.third_year_ratio, isci.one_period_content, isci.one_period_amount, isci.one_period_ratio FROM ipo_supplier_customer_main iscm LEFT JOIN ipo_supplier_customer_info isci ON iscm.id = isci.bid WHERE iscm.bid = #{bid} AND iscm.main_type = #{mainType}

SELECT id, bid, report_period AS reportPeriod, business_name AS businessName, CONVERT(one_period_amount,DECIMAL(18,2)) AS onePeriodAmount, CONVERT(third_year_amount,DECIMAL(18,2)) AS thirdYearAmount, CONVERT(second_year_amount,DECIMAL(18,2)) AS secondYearAmount, CONVERT(first_year_amount,DECIMAL(18,2)) AS firstYearAmount, CONVERT(one_period_amount/(SELECT SUM(one_period_amount) FROM ipo_main_income_info WHERE bid = #{bid})*100,DECIMAL(18,2)) AS onePeriodRatio, CONVERT(third_year_amount/(SELECT SUM(third_year_amount) FROM ipo_main_income_info WHERE bid = #{bid})*100,DECIMAL(18,2)) AS thirdYearRatio, CONVERT(second_year_amount/(SELECT SUM(second_year_amount) FROM ipo_main_income_info WHERE bid = #{bid})*100,DECIMAL(18,2)) AS secondYearRatio, CONVERT(first_year_amount/(SELECT SUM(first_year_amount) FROM ipo_main_income_info WHERE bid = #{bid})*100,DECIMAL(18,2)) AS firstYearRatio FROM ipo_main_income_info WHERE bid = #{bid}

SELECT ic.title, ic.establish_date AS establishDate, (SELECT group_concat(mcl2.label_name) FROM maa_conf_label mcl2 WHERE mcl2.label_code = 'IPO_SPECIAL_ARRANGE' AND find_in_set(mcl2.label_value,ic.special_arrange)) AS specialArrange, CASE WHEN ic.ipo_plate = '069001001006' THEN 1 WHEN ic.ipo_plate = '069001003001' THEN 2 ELSE 0 END AS isTechBoard, (SELECT mcl.label_name FROM maa_conf_label mcl WHERE mcl.label_code = 'IPO_GREEN_PASSAGE' AND mcl.label_value = ic.green_passage) AS greenPassage, (SELECT mcl1.label_name FROM maa_conf_label mcl1 WHERE mcl1.label_code = 'IPO_STATUS' AND mcl1.label_value = ic.case_status) AS processLabel, ip.iec_result AS iecResult, ip3.iec_result AS registerResult, ip4.iec_result AS reviewResult, (select iec_result from ipo_process w2 where ic.id = w2.bid and w2.iec_result is not null order by w2.process_time desc limit 1) labelResult, DATEDIFF( ( SELECT MAX(process_time) FROM ipo_process WHERE tree_type_code = '00' AND process_type_code = '03' AND bid = ic.id ), ( SELECT MIN(process_time) FROM ipo_process WHERE tree_type_code = '00' AND process_type_code = '01' AND bid = ic.id ) ) AS supportDuration, DATEDIFF(ip2.maxDate, ip2.minDate) AS auditDuration FROM ipo_case ic LEFT JOIN ( SELECT bid, iec_result FROM ipo_process WHERE (process_type_code = '07' or process_type_code = '35') AND bid = #{id} ORDER BY process_time DESC LIMIT 1 ) ip ON ic.id = ip.bid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT bid, iec_result FROM ipo_process WHERE process_type_code = '38' AND bid = #{id} ORDER BY process_time DESC LIMIT 1 ) ip3 ON ic.id = ip3.bid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT bid, iec_result FROM ipo_process WHERE process_type_code = '44' AND bid = #{id} ORDER BY process_time DESC LIMIT 1 ) ip4 ON ic.id = ip4.bid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT bid, MAX(process_time) AS maxDate, MIN(process_time) AS minDate FROM ipo_process WHERE tree_type_code = '01' AND bid = #{id} ) ip2 ON ic.id = ip2.bid WHERE ic.id = #{id} LIMIT 1

select max(temp.caseNote) as caseNote,max(temp.favoriteId) as favoriteId from (select ccn.note as caseNote,'' as favoriteId from case_common_notes ccn where ccn.case_id = #{caseId} and ccn.`type` = #{type} and ccn.user_id = #{userId} and ccn.company_id = #{companyId} union all select '',ccf.id as favoriteId from case_common_favorite ccf where ccf.case_id = #{caseId} AND ccf.`type` = #{type} and ccf.user_id = #{userId} and ccf.company_id = #{companyId}) temp
